summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting aerial overhang distribution easements over portions of Lot 9, Block 76, Gren Lake Reservoir Addition; Government Lot 1, Section 25, Township 23 North, Range 3 East, W.M.; Lot 6, Acre 1, Tract 9, Maple Leaf Addition to Greenlake Circle, etc., and placing said easements under the jurisdiction of the City Light Department.
